storyInfo: Franka receives a letter, forcing her to face a past that she had long since sealed away.

attributes.content: Control your distance! Close in!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Slash! Don't just rely on thrusts!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Phew!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Aim low!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Eyah!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You lost.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Franka...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: How many times have I told you? You're using a longsword. Your style may be based around rapiers, but don't rely on thrusts so much.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You don't need to apologize. Old habits die hard. It's not easy to combine those two weapons' techniques, and I'm really just coming up with this on the fly as I train you.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Um, Franka? There's actually something that I've been meaning to ask.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Mm?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You seem to know a lot about my rapier style. Why's that?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hm... Well, before I became a mercenary, I was actually the greatest fencing teacher in all of Columbia.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hehe, normally you'd have to pay the big bucks to take my lessons.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Um, so...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Just kidding. I was never a teacher.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Mnngh... Not another one of your jokes. But why then?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You're very familiar with that particular style. If I remember correctly, last time you even said, 'have you forgotten your third lesson, on how much force to apply to a thrust?' Or something like that.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Right, I wonder why.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Control your distance! Close in!
Aim low!
Have you forgotten your third lesson, on how much force to apply to a thrust?
*Sobs*...
Eh? C'mon, don't cry. I just meant if you're here to learn fencing, you gotta put in some work, you know? I didn't mean it like that. Alright, alright. Don't cry, now.
Alright, that's enough chatter. Let's take it from the top.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Franka raises her sword, holding it right before her nose.
[[character(fadetime=0.3)]]
An opening! Strike!
I've got a chance!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Melantha, who finally managed to threaten Franka's neck with her training sword, notices that her teacher seems to be in a bit of a trance.
Fine, you got me. This is your first win during training, isn't it Mel?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Only because you were a little... A-Anyway, I still have much to learn!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Of course. When did I say you were good enough to graduate from my classes? You still won, though, and that counts for something.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: She strokes Melantha's hair.
Her usual smile has reappeared on her face.
Um... Thank you!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Right, I probably won't be at Rhodes Island much next month. Be sure to keep up your training, okay?
attributes.name: Franka
Melantha
attributes.content: Um? Huh? What are you off to do, Miss Franka...?

attributes.name: Melantha
attributes.content: Ah, I don't mean to pry...

attributes.name: Melantha
attributes.content: If you're going into danger, please, make sure to stay safe.
Don't worry, it's nothing dangerous. I'm just taking some time off for a trip, what with how busy I've been lately.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Huh? Really?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Alright, time's up. Gotta go.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I heard that.
attributes.name: Liskarm
Franka
attributes.content: Wha?

attributes.name: Franka
attributes.content: Oh... I remember, you were there drilling while I was training Mel. What, you heard something?
So what's this about taking time off?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Didn't I just say it's for a trip?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yeah right.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Can't you trust me even a little?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Okay, so what's the destination?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Most governments don't welcome Infected tourists. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh dear, is Little Miss Teacher's Pet really so worried that I'm about to do something dangerous?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm not worried about YOU. I'm just worried about the trouble you'll—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Whatever, screw this song and dance.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yes, I'm worried about you, alright? You were acting so distracted back there. If you ever need help, or just to talk, I'm here for you, okay?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alright, alright... But I really don't need any help, I promise. It's not anything dangerous this time, just a personal matter.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So how do you know so much about rapiers?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Et tu, Liskarm? Why's everyone so curious about this all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You wouldn't normally lose a match like that, but you did. And right after she brought it up.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's my job to worry about my partner when she's not at the top of her game.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alright. I'll tell you. I'm actually the successor to the Victorian Aubigny school of fencing. I was way too talented even, renowned across all of Londinium by the time I was seven.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And apparently God Himself had a problem with that, because I caught Oripathy when I was eight for no apparent reason.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: After my master died, I left Victoria in search of the twelve surviving blades, forged by a legendary blacksmith.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That's the plot of a Higashinese novel, isn't it?! Besides, you're Columbian!
attributes.name: Liskarm
Franka
attributes.content: Heheh...

attributes.name: Franka
attributes.content: Ahem. Truth is, I had a dream when I was eight. After I woke up, I went and followed that dream's guidance, all the way to this remote abandoned city.
Then I met a giant fowlbeast who used its own feathers to stab its prey. I was just a kid, but seeing that technique gave me a revelation—
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: There are no fowlbeasts like that!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Huh. So that's not gonna fly either?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Alright then. So by pure chance, I met a Yanese swordmaster who taught me their secret techniques—
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Come on. Stop fooling around.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If you don't want to talk about it, then fine, forget I asked. Sorry for bringing it up.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Everyone's got things that are hard to talk about. No need to go through all that trouble just to hide it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: One month later...
Um... Liskarm? Do you know if Franka's back yet?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You know, I just asked the Doctor about that.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What did they say?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Nothing in particular, just that we shouldn't worry. She'll be back on schedule.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm still worried about her, though. She seemed a little out of it before she left.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Relax, she'll be fine.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I believe in her.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Aw, how touching! Hey there, you two.
Franka!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Franka...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Honey, I'm home! Okay, Mel, let's get right to business. Let's see if you've gotten rusty this past month.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: A-Alright!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Haah—!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Slash!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Not bad, not bad. You haven't been slacking off, at least. You're connecting your slashes and thrusts much better now. Very nice.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yeah... Um, Franka?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: What's wrong? Did you suddenly notice how cool I am? Is this the birth of yet another Franka stan? In that case, feel free to hop right into my embrace.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You look so much happier now. I'm glad.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Let's continue your training. Have you been working on your basic stances?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, you come from a pretty well-off family, right?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's not worth bringing up...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: At the very least, they're more than capable of paying your medical bills, even if you didn't fight. You only started fencing as a way to stay fit, right?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Why fight, then?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Um, that's just because...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: When my Oripathy was still in its early stages, it used to give me really heightened perception.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: And when I came to Rhodes Island, I saw how everyone was working so hard for their fellow Infected, so I thought... since I have this power, I should do something too.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I should at least try.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: That's how it started, anyway. Since then, my perception's started to recede, and my parents... I haven't been able to get in touch with them for a long time.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: That's why I'm actually very glad that I made this choice. I met so many important friends, and... I can support myself now, even without my parents' help.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Mm. What an inspiring story.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What about you? Why do you fight?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Because I'm a mercenary, of course.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Huh? But—
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Mel, count yourself lucky you found a reason to fight before actually having to do it~
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Anyway, you don't need to hear this next part.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hey, Teacher's Pet. So you finally found it?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Franka... What is that thing you left in my dorm room?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's a letter, duh.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So you took that month off because...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hey, I'm back for debriefing, Doctor.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.options: How've you been? Liskarm was worried.;Go see your partner. She's been worried.

attributes.content: Huh? Really? She's been bothering you about that? What a bitch. I should teach her a lesson.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.options: She didn't bother me.;......;It's so dull here without you two quarreling.

attributes.content: Really? You're so kind, Doctor.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Heehee, I didn't expect you to care about us so much.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.options: Should've kept my mouth shut.;You shouldn't always bottle it up inside.

attributes.content: The Doctor's right.
I have to leave it behind before I can move forward.
And the best way to stop thinking about it might just be to... toss it out like yesterday's trash. Dump and forget.
Right, I was burying my mother.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You were asking how I'm so familiar with Mel's fencing, right?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Her style is basically the standard Victorian foil. It's the top choice among Victoria's upper-class women who want to stay in shape. Of course, it's mostly just for show. It's not all that practical.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: There's really nothing secret about it either. You familiarize yourself with the sword on your first lesson, learn your posture on your second, and how much force to use on your third... It's all the same no matter where you go.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And I learned it myself years ago.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hold on, didn't you just say it's used by the upper-classes?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Right. I... used to be something of a fancy-pants girl myself.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: My hometown's called Givogia. Big city in Columbia. Never heard of it, I'm guessing?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That's because it was destroyed in a Catastrophe when I was thirteen.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Daddy... Daddy...
attributes.name: Young Franka

attributes.content: Don't! Franka! Don't go over there!
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: My dad disappeared during the disaster. My mom and I just happened to be out in the countryside at the time.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: When we saw the Catastrophe clouds, we headed back right away, but... There was nothing left but ruins, buildings torn apart by Originium crystals.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: With the insurance payout plus our savings, we had enough to move to another city, but my mom soon got very sick from overwork.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So as soon as I graduated, I put my old fencing skills to work and became a mercenary—then I met Dr. Longfellow.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: As for what happened next, you've seen it all in my file at Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Oh, now that's not the face I was expecting! Don't worry, that was all a little joke~
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Why, you vixen—!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alright, alright, don't get your panties in a bunch. That did actually happen. Seriously.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That look you had just now was really rude, though.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's okay. That was years ago. I've long since put it behind me. My mom's been sick for years, too. I was more than prepared for it.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: If you really feel bad about it, how about you treat me to tea?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: This was why. This was exactly why I didn't want to tell anyone. I didn't want anyone looking at me with pity like that.
But... now that I've told her everything, it doesn't seem so important anymore.
It's all in the past. Should I be looking toward the future then?
Franka.
attributes.name: Liskarm
Franka
attributes.content: Excuse me? Miss Teacher's Pet wants to talk to me on the road?

attributes.name: Franka
attributes.content: Or are you still hung up on something... What's this?
I'm granting you a three month time-off. I think you need more time to get your head sorted out.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It'll be summer in a month. You can either choose to take it easy, or maybe go some place for a vacation.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Now, if you'll excuse me.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.text: So you still remember my plans to go travelling.
What a unique way to comfort someone. It's just like you, though.
Maybe that future I've been looking forward to is... already here?

attributes.content: Hey, Teacher's Pet... What do you say to coming on that vacation with me?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: This is a letter that has been opened many, many times—

attributes.text: I got the money you sent me, but my treatment really doesn't cost that much. You don't have to keep sending me more.
My condition is still pretty stable. At the very least, I can still write this letter myself, so you really don't have to worry.
Remember to buy yourself some pretty dresses and jewelry. If you ever see anything you like, just buy it. Doll yourself up, and you'll feel better, trust me.
And if you still have any money left over, save it. It's dangerous to be a mercenary your whole life. You should retire as soon as you can afford to.
I was still so young when your father died. There were so many things I never had the chance to enjoy.

All the places I've never visited, all the foods I've never tasted, all the entertainment I've never had the chance to experience... You have to enjoy them for me. That's much more important than my health.
Oh, and of course the most important thing is that you're happy.
Finally... It's been three years since I last saw you, Sweetheart. When will you come home to pay me a visit?
